wikipedia_page.main:
Lewis Henry Hawkins (born 15 June 1993) is an English footballer who plays as a midfielder for Whitby Town.
Hawkins has previously played for Hartlepool United, Whitby Town, York City, Spennymoor Town, Blyth Spartans and Guisborough Town.

Simpson made his senior debut for Hartlepool as a substitute for Lewis Hawkins in a 1–0 defeat to Cheltenham Town on 29 April 2017. Simpson scored his 1st goal for Hartlepool on his first senior start for the club in a 3–1 win over Maidstone United. The goal meant that he was the first player born in the 21st century to have scored for Hartlepool United.https://www.hartlepoolunited.co.uk/news/2018/may/220518-hartlepool-united-2017-18-season-review-september-2017/
